aboutText1: This project was led by Hridaya Yoga's Community team.
aboutText2: Employees and volunteers of the center gathered to visit several remote communities and assess the damage left behind by the hurricane and gauge the assistance received by different sources.
aboutText3: Though the Federal government and several other organizations provided assistance to aid with recovery, many remote communities did not benefit from such efforts.
aboutText4: This project was organized to disburse funds gathered by the Hridaya Yoga community's fundraising efforts.
aboutText5: The Community team decided to partner up with one of these remote communities and use this funding for a longer term community development project, instead of using the funds for temporary relief.
aboutText6: This is an on-going project, where community leaders and Hridaya Yoga are co-working to nurture new sources of income for Agua Dulce, investing in agriculture, pottery, and schooling, among other potential future plans.
